import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import foto from '../../logo/foto.jpg' import foto2 from '../../logo/foto2.jpg' import foto3 from '../../logo/foto3.jpg' import foto4 from '../../logo/foto4.jpg' import foto5 from '../../logo/foto5.jpg' import { data } from '../../mock/dummyData'; import { image } from '../../foto'; import './UsersList.scss'; function UsersList() { const [users, setUsers] = useState(data); const [images, setImage] = useState(image); useEffect(() => { setImage(image); }, [images]) return (

Notat e lojtarëve, Brighton 4-0 Manchester United: Trossard shkëlqen, De Gea dështim
